DOC.brief_summary: Cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) lead cause Taiwan . L-carnitine ( LC ) coenzyme Q10 recognize lipid soluble antioxidant . The purpose study go investigate relation LC coenzyme Q10 marker lipid peroxidation , antioxidant enzyme activity , inflammatory marker coronary artery disease ( CAD ) patient . The study design three-year study . The first year observation study . We recruit CAD patient identify cardiac catheterization least 50 % stenosis one major coronary artery , age-gender match healthy subject . The concentration LC , coenzyme Q10 , lipid peroxidation marker ( TBARS ox-LDL ) , antioxidant enzyme activity ( catalase , glutathione peroxidase , glutathione reductase , superoxide dismutase ) , inflammatory marker go analysis . The second year single-blind , single dose intervention study . CAD subject recruit form first year randomly assign placebo , coenzyme Q10-150 ( 150 mg/d ) , coenzyme Q10-300 ( 300 mg/d ) , LC-1000 ( 1000 mg/d ) LC-2000 ( 2000 mg/d ) group . Intervention go administration three month . Fasting blood obtain month determine concentration LC , coenzyme Q10 , lipid peroxidation marker , antioxidant enzyme activity , inflammatory marker intervention . The third year single-blind , multiple dos intervention study . We go measure CAD subject second year intervention study . After three month washout period , subject assign placebo , coenzyme Q10-150 plus LC-1000 , coenzyme Q10-150 plus LC-2000 , coenzyme Q10-300 plus LC-1000 , coenzyme Q10-300 plus LC-2000 group . Intervention go administration three month . Fasting blood obtain month determine concentration LC , coenzyme Q10 , lipid peroxidation marker , antioxidant enzyme activity , inflammatory marker intervention . Hopefully , result study could provide information LC coenzyme Q10 supplementation clinical dietitian advise CAD patient .
DOC.brief_title: L-carnitine Coenzyme Q10 Relation Oxidative Stress , Antioxidant Enzymes Activities , Inflammation , Risk Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis coronary artery disease ( CAD ) : CAD patient identify least 50 % stenosis one major coronary artery cardiac catheterization receive percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty ( PTCA ) . Health subject : Subjects illnesses history gastrointestinal disorder , cardiovascular disease ( show normal electrocardiogram ) , hypertension , hyperlipidemia , liver renal disease , diabetes , cancer , alcoholism metabolic disease exhibit normal blood biochemical value , include fast blood glucose < 6.11 mmol/L , blood urea nitrogen ( BUN ) < 7.9 mmol/L , creatinine < 123.8 umol/L , alkaline phosphate < 190 U/L , glutamic oxaloacetic transaminase ( GOT ) < 35 U/L glutamic pyruvate transaminase ( GPT ) < 45 U/L . Must able swallow tablet age < 20 year old pregnancy woman take antioxidant vitamin supplement
